author: Peretz Partensky
title: To Beat the Coronavirus, Raise an Army of the Recovered
description: We are at war, and this is our draft. Immunity comes with responsibility.
content:
More than 1 in 34,000 humans on the planet have tested positive and then recovered from Covid-19. The actual number of the recovered is much greater and continues to grow. They are a vastly underappreciated resource!
Their privileged immune state makes them … [+5024 chars]
